mapper.select: SELECT SITE_NT_NUM , SITE_NT_TITLE , SITE_NT_WRITE_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.SITE_NT_NUM , A.SITE_NT_TITLE , A.SITE_NT_WRITE_DATE FROM( SELECT SITE_NT_NUM , SITE_NT_TITLE , SITE_NT_WRITE_DATE FROM SITE_NT Where NT_CTG_CODE = 'faq' AND DELETE_YN = 'n' ORDER BY SITE_NT_WRITE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RN > ( #{pageNum} - 1 ) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(SITE_NT_NUM) FROM SITE_NT WHERE NT_CTG_CODE = 'faq' AND DELETE_YN = 'n'
